mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.subject AS "subject", a.title AS "title", a.option_a AS "optionA", a.option_b AS "optionB", a.option_c AS "optionC", a.option_d AS "optionD", a.answer AS "answer", a.analysis AS "analysis", a.label AS "label", a.type AS "type", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question ( id, subject, title, option_a, option_b, option_c, option_d, answer, analysis, label, type, create_date, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{subject}, #{title}, #{optionA}, #{optionB}, #{optionC}, #{optionD}, #{answer}, #{analysis}, #{label}, #{type}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET title = #{title}, option_a = #{optionA}, option_b = #{optionB}, option_c = #{optionC}, option_d = #{optionD}, answer = #{answer}, analysis = #{analysis}, label = #{label}, type = #{type}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM question t WHERE t.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND t.subject = #{subject}
